    • printFinancialRecordById

      public void printFinancialRecordById(int recordID)
      Prints the details of a financial record based on the provided record ID.
      Specified by:
      printFinancialRecordById in interface IFinancialRecordService
      Parameters:
      recordID - The ID of the financial record to print.
      Throws:
      FinancialRecordException - If the financial record with the given ID is not found.

    • printFinancialRecordsByEmployeeId

      public void printFinancialRecordsByEmployeeId(int employeeId)
      Prints the details of financial records associated with a specific employee based on the provided employee ID.
      Specified by:
      printFinancialRecordsByEmployeeId in interface IFinancialRecordService
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee for whom financial records should be printed.
      Throws:
      FinancialRecordException - If no financial records are found for the given employee ID.

    • printFinancialRecordsForDate

      public void printFinancialRecordsForDate(String recordDate)
      Prints the details of financial records for a specific date.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      recordDate - The date for which financial records should be printed.
      Throws:
      FinancialRecordException - If no financial records are found for the given date.
